name: Audio Horror Game
description:
Play as a blind character who is given the task to slay an ancient monster in this audio only game

This games works through audio and soundeffects. It is impossible to play the game without headphones.

Any feedback is welcome

Controls:
WASD to move
Left and right arrow keys to turn 90 degrees
space to echolocate to your left and right
E to shoot your gun if you have one

Credits:
"Cthulhu growl.wav" by syclon8472 of Freesound.org( https://freesound.org/s/249686/ )
